snippet.title: SEGA AGES Virtua Racing & Wonder Boy: Monster Land | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
SEGA AGES Virtua Racing and Wonder Boy: Monster Land are now available on the Nintendo Switch for $7.99 each! Featuring a plethora of incredible quality-of-life improvements (including 8-player simultaneous local multiplayer in Virtua Racing and challenge modes in Wonder Boy: Monster Land), pick up THE definitive versions of these arcade classics!

Official website: https://segaages.sega.com/
